summary.span: 使用字符串（而不是对象）强类型的键和值来实现哈希表。

span.span: Implements a hash table with the key and the value strongly typed to be strings rather than objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥不能为`null`，但值可以。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. 键的处理方式不区分大小写;在使用字符串字典之前，它将转换为小写。The key is handled in a case-insensitive manner; it is translated to lowercase before it is used with the string dictionary. 在.NET Framework 1.0 版中，此类使用区分区域性的字符串比较。In .NET Framework version 1.0, this class uses culture-sensitive string comparisons. 但是，在.NET Framework 1.1 及更高版本中，此类使用比较字符串时。However, in .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, this class uses when comparing strings. 有关区域性的比较和排序的影响的详细信息，请参阅[执行非区域性敏感型字符串操作](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md)。For more information about how culture affects comparisons and sorting, see [Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations](~/docs/standard/globalization-localization/performing-culture-insensitive-string-operations.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了几个属性和方法的。The following code example demonstrates several of the properties and methods of . [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CPP/stringdictionary.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CS/stringdictionary.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/VB/stringdictionary.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 公共静态 (在 Visual Basic 中) 的此类型的成员是线程安全。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供同步 （线程安全） 包装器，但是，派生的类可以创建他们自己的同步的版本使用属性。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

related.span: 执行不区分区域性的字符串操作

span.span: Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations

remarks.format: ## Remarks StringDictionary 的元素的值进行比较指定的值使用方法。The values of the elements of the StringDictionary are compared to the specified value using the method. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间是成比例。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 也就是说，此方法是 O (`n`) 操作，其中`n`是。That is, this method is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . 从.NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象并上的方法`item`来确定是否`item`存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在.NET Framework 的早期版本中，通过进行此判断和方法的`item`参数在集合中的对象。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码中的元素的示例搜索。The following code example searches for an element in a . summary.span: 返回循环访问字符串字典的枚举数。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the string dictionary.

returns.span: 循环访问字符串字典的 。

span.span: An that iterates through the string dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果越过集合，枚举器的末尾放置在集合中的最后一个元素的后面和返回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举数位于此位置上，对后续调用还返回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用到返回`false`，是不确定的。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合进行更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举数将失效且不可恢复，而且其行为是不确定的。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and its behavior is undefined. 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的元素。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/CPP/stringdictionary_enumeration.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/CS/stringdictionary_enumeration.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/VB/stringdictionary_enumeration.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个实例不同步。A instance is not synchronized. 派生的类可以提供的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

span.span: If the specified key is not found, Get returns , and Set creates a new entry with the specified key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 键的处理方式不区分大小写;在使用之前，它将转换为小写。The key is handled in a case-insensitive manner; it is translated to lowercase before it is used. 密钥不能为`null`，但值可以。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can. 来区分`null`因为找不到指定的键返回并`null`返回指定键的值是因为`null`，使用方法，以确定项是否存在列表中。To distinguish between `null` that is returned because the specified key is not found and `null` that is returned because the value of the specified key is `null`, use the method to determine if the key exists in the list. C# 语言使用关键字来定义而不是实现索引器属性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 检索此属性的值是 o （1） 的操作;将属性设置也是 o （1） 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation; setting the property is also an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的元素。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/CPP/stringdictionary_enumeration.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/CS/stringdictionary_enumeration.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_Enumeration/VB/stringdictionary_enumeration.vb#1)]

An that provides the keys in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的键的顺序未指定，但它是中的关联值的顺序相同返回的方法。The order of the keys in the is unspecified, but it is the same order as the associated values in the returned by the method. 返回不是静态副本，而是，反过来引用在原始密钥。The returned is not a static copy; instead, the refers back to the keys in the original . 因此，更改为继续反映在。Therefore, changes to the continue to be reflected in the . 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例枚举中的元素。The following code example enumerates the elements of a . span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the string dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含具有指定键的元素保持不变。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 键的处理方式不区分大小写;然后使用它来查找要从字符串字典中移除的项，它将转换为小写。The key is handled in a case-insensitive manner; it is translated to lowercase before it is used to find the entry to remove from the string dictionary. 此方法为 o （1） 运算。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何添加和移除元素从。The following code example demonstrates how to add and remove elements from a . [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove/CPP/stringdictionary_addremove.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove/CS/stringdictionary_addremove.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary_AddRemove/VB/stringdictionary_addremove.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 一个可用于同步对 的访问的 。

span.span: An that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生的类可以提供其自己的同步的版本使用属性。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须在执行操作的，而不是直接在。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它维护与其他线程可能同时对修改的正确同步对象。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何锁定集合使用在整个枚举期间。The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration. [!code-cpp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CPP/source2.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/CS/source2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collection.Specialized.StringDictionary/VB/source2.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值的运算复杂度为 O(1)。Retrieving the value of this property is an O(1) operation.
